titleStmt.title: A panegyrick upon His Majesties glorious return from the wars, after the conclusion of a general peace. By Joseph Brown, Dr. of physick and the civil laws
titleStmt.author: Browne, Joseph, fl. 1700-1721.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for A. Bosvile, at the Dyal over against St. Dunstans Church in Fleetstreet, and to be sold by E. Whitlock, near Stationers Hall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the William Andrews Clark Memorial Library.

place.placeName: the Dyal over against St. Dunstans Church in Fleetstreet
